quiz.question: Which of the following statements about living things is correct?

options.A: Animals respire using carbon(IV)oxide as a raw material
options.B: Growth in plants is limited after some time
options.C: Most plants respond to stimulus slowly

options.A: Industrial chimneys, burning fossil oils and river dams
options.B: Sulphur dioxide, acid rain and pesticides
options.C: Sulphur dioxide, vehicle exhausts, and aerosols

quiz.question: Which parts of P and Q fuse to complete the biological process?

options.A: Both cells are structures for asexual reproduction
options.B: Both cells normally belong to the same individual
options.C: Both cells are found in plants
options.D: The union of both cells gives rise to a new mammal
